Character.name: DS/Eliot
intro: DS: Look at this loser, going solo!
DS: It works better when you bring a bro, bro!
Eliot: Hi! I'm Eliot!  It's nice to meet--
DS: --bro. Get it together.  We're *fighting* this loser.
Eliot: Uh... Yeah! We're tough! And we never fight alone! ...do we bro?

attacks.name: Double-Smug
dialog: DS: Show him your mean face, bro!
DS and Eliot give you the rare double-stinkeye.
Your feelings are twice as hurt.

attacks.name: Quadruple-Slap
dialog: DS and Eliot each double-slap you. As slap quantities go, it's kind of a lot of slaps.

attacks.name: Hinge-Pinch
dialog: DS: I'd say this loser looks like he's in... a bit of a pinch!
Eliot closes his lid around you in a vicious pinch.
It hurts. But at least you're sure you're not dreaming?

attacks.name: Double-Stomp
dialog: The two close up to smash you with their full weight.
It turns out they weigh a considerable amount.

followup: DS: Yeah, well you're... half as... ugly?
DS: YEAH? Well YOU'RE UGLY, ELIOT!
Eliot: No, we fight together because we're best friends!
Eliot: It's not so bad! We're best friends!

conversations.prompt: Eliot reaches reaches down to DS for a double high-five... but DS ignores it.

followup: DS: Hey, leave my bro out of this, bro!

replies.text: Bet I could take you solo
followup: DS and Eliot look mildly irritated.

replies.text: Pick on someone your own size
followup: DS and Eliot look mildly irritated.

conversations.prompt: DS: Still standing, huh?  Well, not for long.

replies.text: Is DS always such a jerk?
followup: Eliot: I mean... only a lot sometimes.
DS: What?!  Only because you're SO clingy!
DS: Bro. You are literally clinging to me, ALL of the time.

replies.text: Two screens doesn't make better games!
followup: DS and Eliot look pretty annoyed.
DS and Eliot look mildly irritated.

conversations.prompt: DS: Okay bro. Let's show this loser we mean business.  ...bro?

followup: DS: Whoa, dude... that is not cool, bro.
DS: Tell him that's not cool, Eliot!

replies.text: Shame you couldn't be handsome twins
followup: DS and Eliot look pretty annoyed.
DS and Eliot look mildly irritated.

replies: DS: Whoa... I want a camera.
Eliot: I think I have a camera...
DS: What?! Why don't I get to use it?
The two get into a slap fight.  The whole thing is frankly embarrassing.
DS: Oh man... that sound... those speakers are so sick...
Eliot: Oh man... our speakers don't sound anything like that, bro...
DS: Oh man. I could print pictures of my sweet flexing poses.
Eliot: That does look pretty cool...
DS: What?! How did you even get that?!
Eliot: We don't even have that...

win: In all of the commotion, DS and Eliot both failed to notice the crack straining along their hinge.
As the two start to argue and quarrel, the hinge finally cracks, and the two fall, separate.
DS: Oh man... this is the way our reputation ends, bro.
DS: Not with a totally sick explosion or whatever...
Eliot: ...but a whimper.
DS looks confused.  Eliot looks sad.
They both look a little lost.
DS: Well... I guess I'm... finally free of you, bro.
Eliot: Yeah. I guess this is what you always wanted.
DS: I mean, yeah, but... this feels... kinda weird.
Eliot: ...maybe I've relied on you too long, bro.
Eliot: I think... it might be time we go our separate ways.
DS: Whoa.  Well... if you think it's best, little bro.
DS: You gonna be okay?
Eliot thinks for a moment. Then looks up at you. An idea occurs to him.
Eliot: Mind if I travel with you a while?
Eliot: I'd like to see the rest of this great big cu-de-sac someday.  And I could be useful!
Eliot: My screen is pretty big, and has a backlight!  I could help you out!
DS: ...I'm... I'm gonna miss you, bro.
Eliot: I know. It's for the best, big bro.
DS: Yeah...
DS: Take care of yourself.
DS: ...and kick some of these other chumps' battery packs for me!
lose: DS: Ha! Loser. I knew we'd win, bro!
Eliot: Don't feel bad, friend! You fought well!
Eliot: My bro's a bit of a jerk, but I bet he'd be up for a rematch...!
